text: Mel and Kim (stylized as MӗL & KIM) were an English pop duo, consisting of sisters Melanie and Kim Appleby. Originally managed by Alan Whitehead, they achieved success between 1986 and 1988, before Melanie lost her battle with cancer in January 1990 at the age of 23. ==See also== *Melissa Etheridge *Melanie Thornton *Princess *Tracy Spencer *Sinitta *Chanté Moore *Sonia Category:British musical groups Category:British girl groups
title: Mel and Kim
